attributes.action: ban the use of Facebook and other social networking sites for all public sector workers
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Government employees and other public sector workers openly admit to spending vast quantities of time browsing and interacting with social networking sites such as Facebook and MySpace. 

Given that they are employees of the state and funded by the taxpayer's money, it is unacceptable that these workers are spending so much time on trivial and un-work related websites. 

The banning of these sites is now becoming commonplace and widespread in the private sector and we the undersigned wish the public sector to follow suit.
